rooms.description: A spacious open-plan area combining entrance and living space. The Mediterranean style is evident in the use of warm, earthy tones, natural stone finishes, and terracotta tiles.
Integrated kitchen with modern Mediterranean aesthetics featuring a large island counter, open shelving, and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide abundant natural light.
An expansive living area with comfortable seating arrangements and built-in bookshelves to integrate the library element. Features floor-to-ceiling windows for a bright atmosphere.

openings.description: A classic Mediterranean arch door with ample sidelights.
Provides outdoor space and natural ventilation, in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: A generously sized bedroom featuring a private balcony. The design incorporates Mediterranean elements such as decorative tile work and warm color palettes.
Well-appointed guest room with built-in wardrobes and floor-to-ceiling windows for privacy and light, reflecting the cottage style.
A shared sleeping area designed for joint family usage. This room is versatile, incorporating a foldable partition that can also serve as a library space when needed.
Dedicated home office with a quiet layout and floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure ample light, positioned in the eastern section for positive energy according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Secure and accessible staircase connecting ground and first floor.
Small balcony attached to the family bedroom for fresh air.
